title: When I hold to paste in Google Chrome app or search bar only Autofill comes up, not the paste option
content: Can not use paste function in Google chrome app or home screen search bar. Issue was noticed today. I have restarted phone multiple times and uninstalled then reinstalled all updates for chrome app to no avail. Instead of paste, "Autofill" pops up. If I type text into the boxes I still get copy / cut / select all options, but can not Paste. Please help!
